trans-unit.source: Used to specify which configuration file is to be represented by the Configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定将由 Configuration 对象表示的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel> to specify which configuration file is to be represented by the Configuration object returned by <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.OpenMachineConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel>可以指定的配置文件是由返回的配置对象表示<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.OpenMachineConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Application configuration files are in the same directory as the application and have the same name, but with a .config extension.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件与应用程序相同的目录中，并且具有相同的名称，但扩展名为.config 的。

trans-unit.source: For example, the configuration file for C:\System\Public.exe is C:\System\Public.exe.config.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C:\System\Public.exe 的配置文件是 C:\System\Public.exe.config。

trans-unit.source: Applications use a global configuration that applies to all users, separate configurations that apply to individual users, and configurations that apply to roaming users.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用适用于所有用户、 应用于单个用户的单独配置和应用于漫游用户配置的全局配置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Get the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> that applies to all users.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于所有用户的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" />。

trans-unit.source: Get the roaming <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> that applies to the current user.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于当前用户的漫游 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" />。

trans-unit.source: Get the local <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> that applies to the current user.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于当前用户的本地 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" />。
